Summary Note:
The RM is Gómez Torres Martín's brother-in-law, having married his's sister. This family connection has strengthened their professional collaboration, allowing for seamless communication and trust.
Gómez Torres Martín is a 54 year old and comes from Spain.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, he chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Gómez Torres Martín is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1988, Gómez finished his secondary school education at IES Antonio Machado Logroño.
Gómez finished his studies at Polytechnic University of Madrid in 1994.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 30 years, Gómez Torres Martín has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Gómez Torres Martín began his professional journey as a Ship Broker at Naviera Armas S.A. in 1995, laying the foundation for future success.
His subsequent role was as a Shipping Company Owner at Peñarroya Shipping S.A., where he continued to grow professionally from 2000 to 2001.
He spent 22 years working as a Fleet Manager at Transmediterránea S.A., refining his expertise and building a strong network.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 520000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 2010000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 5450000 EUR from his late grandfather, a renowned Private Equity Manager, in 2011.
Client Summary: In summary, Gómez has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
